item.title: 联合健康集团首席执行官安德鲁-威蒂说医疗系统存在缺陷
item.description: 联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）首席执行官安德鲁-威蒂（Andrew Witty）周五在《纽约时报》的一篇评论文章中写道，医疗保健系统存在缺陷，是 "几十年来建立起来的拼凑"。【原文：UnitedHealth Group CEO Andrew Witty wrote in a New York Times opinion piece on Friday that the healthcare system was flawed and was a "patchwork built over decades."】

item.title: 美国与博世就 2.25 亿美元芯片资助达成初步协议
item.description: 美国商务部周五表示，已与德国汽车供应商博世达成初步协议，博世将获得高达 2.25 亿美元的补贴，用于在加利福尼亚州生产电动汽车所需的碳化硅功率半导体。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department said Friday it reached a preliminary deal with German auto supplier Bosch for up to $225 million in subsidies to build silicon carbide power semiconductors in California that are key for electric vehicles.】

item.title: 国际能源机构称，页岩钻探技术可能导致地热激增
item.description: 国际能源机构（IEA）周五表示，页岩钻探技术导致石油和天然气产量激增，同时也刺激了地热的发展，从理论上讲，地热可提供稳定的电力来源，相当于印度和美国需求的总和。【原文：The shale drilling techniques that led to a boom in oil and gas output have also spurred the development of geothermal, which in theory could provide a stable source of power equal to the demand of India and the United States combined, the IEA said on Friday.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁征收新关税，中国着眼于谈判
item.description: 分析人士称，随着唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）加大对中国的关税威胁，中国政府正在采取行动，以自己的限制措施击败下一任美国总统，并在全面爆发贸易战之前让华盛顿坐到谈判桌前。【原文：As Donald Trump steps up his tariff threats against China, Beijing is moving to beat the next U.S. president to the punch with its own restrictions and get Washington to the negotiating table ahead of a full-blown trade war, analysts say.】

item.title: 独家：马来西亚棕榈油局（MPOB）称暴雨将在 12 月再次打击马来西亚棕榈油产量
item.description: 马来西亚棕榈油行业监管机构周五告诉路透社，由于强降雨影响了世界第二大热带油生产国的棕榈油收获，12月份马来西亚棕榈油产量将连续第四个月下降。【原文：Malaysia's palm oil production is set to fall for the fourth consecutive month in December as heavy rainfall hit harvesting in the world's second-largest producer of the tropical oil, the industry regulator told Reuters on Friday.】

item.title: 中国 CATL 为供应商提供资金支持以推动电池创新
item.description: 中国 CATL 向供应商表示，愿意为他们提供资金支持，以加快电池材料和设备的技术创新，这是在残酷的电动汽车价格战中缓解供应链压力的努力之一。【原文：China's CATL has told suppliers it is willing to provide them with financial support to speed up technology innovation in battery materials and equipment, part of efforts to relieve stress on its supply chain amid a brutal EV price war.】

item.title: 特斯拉在中国推出 "其实智能召唤 "功能
item.description: 美国汽车制造商特斯拉周五在中国推出了 "其实智能召唤 "功能。【原文：U.S. automaker Tesla on Friday launched the "Actually Smart Summon" feature in China.】

item.title: 波兰 CD Projekt 公司发布《巫师 4》游戏预告片
item.description: 波兰最大的视频游戏制造商 CD Projekt 周五发布了其计划中的奇幻大片《巫师》系列新游戏的预告片。【原文：Poland's biggest video game maker CD Projekt on Friday released a trailer for its planned new game in the blockbuster "Witcher" fantasy series.】

item.title: 澳大利亚明星娱乐公司黄金海岸赌场主管离职
item.description: 陷入困境的澳大利亚赌场运营商 Star Entertainment 周五表示，其旗下 Star Gold Coast 赌场的首席执行官在上任仅三个月后辞职，几天前该赌场的执照暂停期被延长至三月。【原文：Embattled Australian casino operator Star Entertainment on Friday said the CEO of its Star Gold Coast casino has resigned just three months into the job and days after the casino's license suspension was extended until March.】

item.title: 欧洲央行维勒鲁瓦：未来将有更多降息举措
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（ECB）决策者弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）周五表示，欧洲中央银行明年可能会进一步放宽利率，并对市场对未来利率的预测表示放心。【原文：The European Central Bank is likely to further ease interest rates next year and is at ease with market projections for future rates, ECB policymaker Francois Villeroy de Galhau said on Friday.】

item.title: 德国 10 月出口降幅超预期
item.description: 德国 10 月份出口降幅超过预期，这表明期待已久的外部需求复苏已被推迟。【原文：German exports fell more than expected in October, an indication that the long-awaited recovery in external demand has been delayed.】

item.title: 英国经济意外萎缩，蕾切尔-里夫斯再遭打击
item.description: 英国经济在 10 月份意外萎缩了 0.1%，有迹象表明英国经济放缓幅度大于预期，这对财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）来说是个坏消息，她认为周五的官方数据 "令人失望"。【原文：Britain's economy shrank unexpectedly by 0.1% in October, adding to signs of a bigger-than-expected slowdown in more bad news for finance minister Rachel Reeves, who described Friday's official data as "disappointing".】

item.title: 受特朗普政策担忧和美元升值影响，11月份外资流出打击亚洲债券
item.description: 由于预期即将上台的特朗普政府将改变美国的贸易政策以及美元走强抑制了投资者的胃口，亚洲债务市场在 11 月份出现了七个月以来的首次外资流出。【原文：Asian debt markets witnessed foreign outflows in November for the first time in seven months as expectations of changes in U.S. trade policies under the forthcoming Trump administration and a strengthening dollar dampened investor appetite.】

item.title: 中国债券市场将面临更多经济阵痛
item.description: 中国债券投资者押注 2025 年经济不会出现奇迹般的复苏，这使他们与押注消费复苏的股票市场背道而驰。【原文：Investors in Chinese bonds head for 2025 betting there will be no miraculous recovery in the economy, putting them at odds with an equities market that has wagered on a revival in consumption.】

item.title: 日本 11 月通胀可能加速，出口因日元疲软而增长
item.description: 路透社周五的一项民意调查显示，受大米价格居高不下和公用事业补贴逐步取消的影响，日本 11 月份的核心消费价格通胀可能加速。【原文：Japan's core consumer price inflation probably accelerated in November, driven by persistently high rice prices and the phasing out of utility subsidies, a Reuters poll showed on Friday.】

item.title: 早间竞价：全球降息让美元占据主导地位
item.description: Stella Qiu 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Stella Qiu】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会重启对埃隆-马斯克的 Neuralink 公司的调查
item.description: 根据马斯克周四在社交媒体平台 X 上分享的一封信，美国证券交易委员会（SEC）本周重启了对埃隆-马斯克的脑芯片初创公司 Neuralink 的调查。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) this week has reopened an investigation into Elon Musk's brain-chip startup Neuralink, according to a letter shared by Musk on Thursday on social media platform X.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称新加坡和越南公司正在洽谈新海底电缆项目
item.description: 新加坡资产管理公司吉宝集团（Keppel）和越南企业集团索维科集团（Sovico Group）正在讨论新的海底光缆计划，这将促进该地区数据中心产业的发展。【原文：Singaporean asset manager Keppel and Vietnamese conglomerate Sovico Group are discussing plans for new undersea fiber-optic cables that would boost the region's data centre industry, people familiar with the discussions said.】

item.title: 大多数经济学家认为日本央行 12 月不会加息
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，大多数经济学家表示，日本央行将在 12 月份的政策会议上将利率维持在 0.25%，以评估海外风险和明年的工资前景，这与上个月的调查结果显示的情况有所不同。【原文：The Bank of Japan will hold interest rates at 0.25% at its December policy meeting as it assesses overseas risks and next year's wage outlook, a majority of economists said in a Reuters poll, in a shift from a survey last month.】

item.title: 日本央行的加息计划因小型企业的工资困境而蒙上阴影
item.description: 日本小企业的工资支出远高于大企业，它们可能难以继续提高工资，这让人怀疑工资涨幅能否扩大到足以让央行继续加息的程度。【原文：Japan's small firms are spending far more of their profits on wages than their bigger counterparts and could struggle to keep hiking pay, casting doubt on whether wage gains could broaden enough for the central bank to keep raising interest rates.】

item.title: 亚马逊向特朗普就职典礼基金捐款 100 万美元，并将在 Prime Video 上播出活动盛况
item.description: 亚马逊发言人周四表示，亚马逊将向美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的就职典礼基金捐款100万美元，该公司将在其Prime视频服务中播放这一活动。【原文：Amazon is donating $1 million to U.S. President-elect Donald Trump's inaugural fund and the company will air the event on its Prime Video service, an Amazon spokesperson said on Thursday.】

item.title: 亚洲股市下跌，长期国债将迎来一年来最差一周
item.description: 亚洲股市周五下跌，原因是美元走强导致风险情绪脆弱，而随着对美国 2025 年大幅降息的预期减弱，较长期国债收益率将创下今年以来最大单周涨幅。【原文：Asia shares fell on Friday as a strong dollar kept risk sentiment fragile, while longer-dated Treasury yields are heading for their biggest weekly rise this year as expectations for deep U.S. rate cuts in 2025 recede.】

item.title: 美联储减产观望，美元本周将创一个月来最佳表现
item.description: 周五，美元兑主要货币升至两周半以来的高点，有望创下一个月以来的最佳一周汇率，因为市场押注美联储将在下周降息，但随后将对进一步降息采取耐心态度。【原文：The dollar rose to a 2 1/2-week high against major peers on Friday, on track for its best week in a month, amid bets that the Federal Reserve would cut interest rates next week but then take a patient approach to further reductions.】

item.title: 墨西哥参议院批准为应用程序司机提供工作福利
item.description: 墨西哥参议院周四批准了旨在改善 DiDi、Rappi 和 Uber 等叫车和送货服务司机条件的改革措施，确保他们获得社会保障和圣诞奖金等福利。【原文：Mexico's Senate on Thursday approved reforms to improve conditions for drivers with ride-hailing and delivery services such as DiDi , Rappi and Uber , ensuring access to social security and a Christmas bonus, among other benefits.】

item.title: 石油因预测 2025 年供应过剩而走低，但将实现周涨幅
item.description: 周五，油价走低，原因是投资者关注供应充足的预测，撇开中国刺激措施带来的明年需求增加的预期，同时关注美联储下周再次降息。【原文：Oil prices inched lower on Friday as investors focused on a forecast of ample supply and shrugged off expectations of higher demand next year from Chinese stimulus measures, while eyeing another Federal Reserve interest rate cut next week.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：特朗普顾问寻求缩减或取消银行监管机构
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四报道，特朗普过渡团队正在探讨如何大幅削减、合并甚至取消华盛顿的最高银行监管机构。【原文：The Trump transition team is exploring ways to significantly reduce, merge, or even eliminate the top bank regulators in Washington, The Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday.】

item.title: Meta 发布人工智能模型，提升 Metaverse 体验
item.description: Meta 公司周四表示，它将发布一种名为 Meta Motivo 的人工智能模型，该模型可以控制类似人类的数字代理的动作，有可能增强 Metaverse 体验。【原文：Meta said on Thursday it was releasing an artificial intelligence model called Meta Motivo, which could control the movements of a human-like digital agent, with the potential to enhance Metaverse experience.】

item.title: 全球电动汽车销量连续第三次创历史新高
item.description: 市场研究公司 Rho Motion 周五发布的数据显示，11 月份全球纯电动汽车和插电式混合动力汽车的销量连续第七个月增长，同比增长 32%，连续第三个月创历史新高。【原文：Global sales of fully electric and plug-in hybrid vehicles rose for a seventh consecutive month in November, jumping 32% year on year for a third consecutive record high, data from market research firm Rho Motion showed on Friday.】

item.title: 员工入账隐瞒 1.54 亿美元，梅西百货称内部控制失效
item.description: 梅西百货公司（Macy's）周四表示，对其财务状况的重新评估显示，截至今年 2 月，该连锁百货公司的内部控制（包括适当的记录维护）并不有效。【原文：Macy's said on Thursday a re-evaluation of its financials showed that the department store chain's internal control, including proper record maintenance, was not effective as of February this year.】

item.title: 中国考虑削弱人民币汇率，特朗普贸易顾问警告不要操纵汇率
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的一位高级贸易顾问周四告诉路透社，新政府不会 "善待 "中国操纵其货币的任何企图，并回应了路透社关于中国当局正考虑允许人民币明年走软的报道。【原文：A top trade adviser to President-elect Donald Trump told Reuters on Thursday that the new administration would not look "fondly" on any attempt by China to manipulate its currency, responding to a Reuters report that authorities there were considering allowing the yuan to weaken next year.】
